name: Army Truck Hill Road Transport
description:
Army Truck Hill Road Transport is about to go out and transport the army vehicles or transportation to their destination. Complete the mission objective to complete the level. Stay awake! These army base environments have very dangerous roads, mountains and check points. So drive carefully.
Features:
- Multiple Truck and trailer with realistic controls
- 16 different challenging levels
- Real base camp and boarder 3d environment
- Hilly areas, steep paths, hill climb and flying Army helicopters for protocol
- Truck driver performance would be calculated in the end of mission
- Cool HD graphics and awesome playback army band drum music
